## Feature Description
A clear description of what you'd like to see added to Svelo.

## Category
- [ ] New cipher/encoding support
- [ ] Educational content (glossary, tutorial, explanation)
- [ ] Cryptanalysis tool
- [ ] CLI improvement
- [ ] Documentation
- [ ] Other

## Use Case
Why would this feature be helpful? What problem does it solve?

## Example
If applicable, provide an example of how this feature would work:

```bash
# Example command or interaction
svelo --your-feature-here
```

## Additional Context
- Links to resources about the cipher/feature
- Historical context or educational value
- Similar tools that implement this feature
- Any other relevant information

## Implementation Ideas (Optional)
If you have thoughts on how this could be implemented, share them here.
